channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+3024] Actor with Down Syndrome Puts Palin in Her Place *UPDATE*
item.description: In the wake of Palin's attack on Rahm Emmanual for using the term "fucking retarded" (which Palin misrepresents as "f-ing retard"), she has repeatedly defended Rush Limbaugh's multiple uses of the word "retards" when referring to people he did not like as "satire."

item.title: [+2873] US Reaction To 9-11 Made Simple (Gif)
[+2358] Jason Linkins: 'Family Guy' Actress Responds To Sarah Palin'
item.description: Andrea Fay Friedman, the voice actress who played the role of Ellen" --the character depicted as having Down syndrome on the Valentine's Day episode of Family Guy, has responded to the criticism of sometime-Alaska Governor Sarah Palin. Of special significance, Friedman herself has Down syndrome.

item.title: [+2202] HS Student's ‘God is Dead’ T-Shirt Gets Him In Hot Water
item.description: Arlington(WA) High School senior Justin Surber was wearing his “God is dead” T-shirt when he was photographed with his debate class. There was one problem. The yearbook adviser didn't like it despite allowing photos of students wearing clothing with Christian messages in the yearbook. He stood up for his rights and won't appear in the yearbook.

item.title: [+1533] 30 Useful (and Unknown) Web Apps You Need to Bookmark!
item.description: To help you prepare for a future in the cloud, we've put together a list of 30 of our favorite web apps and services. We've tried to keep them on the lesser-known side, but a few of the classics have snuck their way in.

item.title: [+1307] Double Toke: Bill Reintroduced to Legalize, Tax Pot in Cali.
item.description: "Our prisons are overflowing and it's easier now for teenagers to get marijuana than alcohol," said California Assemblyman Tom Ammiano."We simply cannot afford to continue keeping our heads in the sand and pretend that everything is fine."

item.title: [+1131] Rubio Slams Obama's Teleprompter While In Front Of Telemprom
item.description: The Tea Party's choice in the Florida Republican primary, Marco Rubio, began his address to a crowd of conservative conventioneers by taking a shot at President Obama for reading from a teleprompter. He did it while standing in front of two easily visible teleprompters.

item.title: [+1130] Glenn Beck's Dark Past
item.description: Before he was tapped to give the keynote address at CPAC, the Fox host's history was riddled with drugs and mental illness. John Avlon on how Beck became the Pied Piper of the right for the angry and disenfranchised.

item.title: [+1090] So.... Where are you from?
[+894] Why you want to be an engineer (COMIC)
[+833] Atheist Billboard Vandalized
item.description: A billboard near Sacramento promoting atheism was vandalized by someone depicting atheists as lost, one of the billboard's sponsor said.

item.title: [+786] Judge Keeps His Word to Immigrant Who Kept His
item.description: When the judge sentenced the juvenile in 1996, he promised to stand behind him if he stayed out of trouble. But almost 15 years after his crimes, the ex-offender came to the attention of immigration authorities in a system that makes no allowances for rehabilitation. Now the judge is trying to keep his side of the bargain.

item.title: [+710] xkcd: Principle of Explosion
[+663] LEGO Robot Solves Any Rubik's Cube In Under 12 Sec (Video)
item.description: The Worlds Fastest Lego Mindstorms RCX Speedcubing Robot. Built entirely from lego elements now scanning and solving any 3x3x3 Rubik's cube combination in under 12 seconds.

item.title: [+608] Steve Jobs: Ditch Flash Technology
item.description: Apple CEO Steve Jobs told WSJ staffers to ditch Flash and replace Flash-based content with other web standards, a move that's doable, but not necessarily trivial.

item.title: [+605] My, how time flies..(PIC)
item.description: Hermione all grown up....Originally published on Google Buzz by Pavel Lokhmakov

item.title: [+599] William Shatner Will Play The Dad In 'Shit My Dad Says'
item.description: Twitter sensation Shit My Dad Says is becoming a TV pilot with William Shatner set to play the larger-than-life dad at the center of it...

item.title: [+566] CNN: Smelly passenger kicked off flight
item.description: Air travelers already have to deal with unruly passengers, excessively talkative ones and many other types who make flying miserable. But a new low may just have been reached for weary road warriors: The overwhelmingly smelly passenger. A man on Jazz Air, a regional airline in Canada that also serves U.S. cities, was reportedly kicked off a plane.

item.title: [+562] Conan Enjoying Unemployment: Grows a Beard, Kisses Dolphins
item.description: Conan was spotted on vacation in Hawaii with his wife and kids on Thursday and the red headed host made the most of the warm tropical waters by taking a dip with a dolphin.
